TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RadioButtonRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現包含或不包含視覺化樣式的選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (亦稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button)) 的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render an option button control (also known as a radio button) with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`方法，可以用來呈現選項按鈕控制項。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render an option button control. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要繪製選項按鈕，使用其中一種方法。To draw an option button, use one of the methods. 這些方法會提供各種不同的選項，例如將文字繪製或選項按鈕的影像。These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image with the option button. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，會繪製目前視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the option button with the current visual style. 否則，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的 Windows 樣式。Otherwise, will draw the option button with the classic Windows style. 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該自動符合作業系統的目前視覺化樣式設定。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個所公開的項目類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫自訂控制項，以便使用繪製選項按鈕，以回應滑鼠點選動作的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to write a custom control that uses the method to draw an option button that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

Public Shared Sub DrawParentBackground (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, childControl As Control)

static member DrawParentBackground : System.Drawing.Graphics * System.Drawing.Rectangle * System.Windows.Forms.Control -> unit

param.name: g
param.span: 用於繪製 childControl 之父代背景的 。

span.span: The used to draw the background of the parent of childControl.

param.name: bounds
param.span: ，會在其中繪製父控制項的背景。

span.span: The in which to draw the parent control's background.

param.span: 這個矩形應該位於子控制項的範圍內。

span.span: This rectangle should be inside the child control’s bounds.

param.name: childControl
param.span: 要繪製其父代背景的控制項。

span.span: The control whose parent's background will be drawn.

summary.span: 在指定的區域中繪製控制項父代的背景。

span.span: Draws the background of a control's parent in the specified area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前視覺化樣式的選項按鈕 （也稱為選項按鈕）。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button (also known as a radio button) with the current visual style. 否則，這個方法會繪製傳統的 Windows 樣式的選項按鈕。Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.

summary.span: 繪製選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button))。

span.span: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button).

span.span: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button) in the specified state and location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button with the current visual style. 否則，這個方法會繪製傳統的 Windows 樣式的選項按鈕。Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用自訂控制項的方法方法，取決於滑鼠指標位置的狀態中繪製選項按鈕。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw an option button in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出產生器是否會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，則會使用從設定屬性來判斷呈現樣式。If the property is `true`, the uses the setting from the property to determine the rendering style. 如果是`false`，轉譯器一律會呈現使用視覺化樣式。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性以顯示的呈現樣式根據應用程式狀態變更。The following code example uses the property to show the render style is changed depending on the application state. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
